attributes.action: General election if Govt doesn’t meet its pre election promises within 6months
attributes.additional_details: No confidence in this government, most pre election zero tax rise promises have been broken
attributes.background: Automatically start the general election process  if a government is unlikely to meet most of its pre election promises within 6 months

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700035
